issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: User has to constantly re-enter usernames and passwords. Error is "Secure storage was unable to retrieve the master password from the OS keyring"

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Titanium studio crashes when creating new alloy project

comments.body:
Hmm, it's sort of hard to know which error in that log is the problem. Did you clear the log beforehand?

Please could you also attach your diagnostic log? (Found at Help -> Studio -> Run Diagnostic Test)

Thanks.

Hi levani,

I'm not sure if the errors in the log are related to the crash, but as stated in TISTUD-2218, the password errors have been fixed for Studio 3.1.2. It might be worth trying the nightly from http://preview.appcelerator.com/studio/

Hello Levani,

Can you please confirm that you have tested using Studio 3.1.2 and whether or not you still are experiencing this issue?

Thanks,

Carter
Updated Studio to version 3.1.3 and created several test projects. Everything seem to be OK now.
